titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Dorchester in the county of Dorcet, at the proclaiming of His sacred Majesty Charles the II. May 15. 1660. By Gilbert Ironsyde Batchelour of Divinity, and minister of Stepleton in the said county.
titleStmt.author: Ironside, Gilbert, 1588-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Clavell at the Staggs head in S. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Staggs head in S. Pauls Church-yard
